name: MenuRowBuilder
description: Created by Nezz on 7/10/2022 Utility class to help create MenuRows to use in the new menu interactions

methods.name: MenuRow
methods.description: Builds a MenuRow from a given Player with a given action

methods.name: buildFromObject
methods.signature: public static MenuRow buildFromObject​(GameObject gameObject, java.lang.String action)
methods.description: Builds a MenuRow for a given GameObject and a given Action

methods.name: buildFromNpc
methods.signature: public static MenuRow buildFromNpc​(NPC npc, java.lang.String action)
methods.description: Builds MenuRow for given NPC with given action

methods.name: buildFromPlayer
methods.signature: public static MenuRow buildFromPlayer​(Player player, java.lang.String action)
methods.description: Builds a MenuRow from a given Player with a given action

methods.name: buildFromGroundItem
methods.signature: public static MenuRow buildFromGroundItem​(GroundItem groundItem, java.lang.String action)
methods.description: Builds a menu row from a ground item with a given action

methods.name: buildFromEntity
methods.signature: public static MenuRow buildFromEntity​(Entity entity, java.lang.String action)
methods.description: Builds a menu row from a given entity with the provided action. Passes the method along to the appropriate entity builder

methods.name: buildForInventory
methods.signature: public static MenuRow buildForInventory​(int slot, java.lang.String action)
methods.description: This is for normal inventory usage, adjusts for bank, GE, and shop

methods.name: buildForBank
methods.signature: public static MenuRow buildForBank​(int slot, java.lang.String action)
methods.description: Builds a MenuRow for a bank withdraw/deposit action

methods.name: buildForWidget
methods.signature: public static MenuRow buildForWidget​(WidgetChild widget, java.lang.String action, java.lang.String object)
methods.description: Builds a MenuRow for a given WidgetChild with the given action and object.

methods.name: buildForWorld
methods.signature: public static MenuRow buildForWorld​(int world, WidgetChild parent)

methods.name: removeFormat
methods.signature: public static java.lang.String removeFormat​(java.lang.String action, java.util.regex.Pattern... patterns)
